title: How to Make Deli Dinner Supreme

steps.headline: Take 3 slices of ham and cover the rice with it.
Open up a can of Vienna sausage and take 2 out of it.
Slice them and put it in a bowl
Crack one egg into the bowl and whisk it.
Put the remaining Vienna sausages into the plate.
Heat up a pan with cooking oil.
steps.description: When the oil is hot, put in the scrambled egg.

steps.headline: When done, put it in the plate.
steps.description: Season it with regular salt or fancy, garlic salt.

steps.headline: Crack the last egg into the pan and fry it regularly.
Put it in the plate and enjoy!

text: Make rice (steamed rice recommended)  Take 3 slices of ham and cover the rice with it.  Open up a can of Vienna sausage and take 2 out of it.  Slice them and put it in a bowl  Crack one egg into the bowl and whisk it.  Put the remaining Vienna sausages into the plate.  Heat up a pan with cooking oil. When the oil is hot, put in the scrambled egg. When done, put it in the plate. Season it with regular salt or fancy, garlic salt. Crack the last egg into the pan and fry it regularly.  Put it in the plate and enjoy!  Finished.
